name: Clumsy Chopper Smash - Top Fly or Hit Crazy 3D Chaos Sky-car Racing Game Challenge
name_original: Clumsy Chopper Smash - Top Fly or Hit Crazy 3D Chaos Sky-car Racing Game Challenge
description:
Captain, your mission today - STAY ALIVE!!!! Clumsy Chopper Smash is the #1 thrilling and action packed flying adventure.


Featuring:

- Simple play , tap anywhere on the screen to fly

- Leaderboards

- Popular pixel art design style

Fun to play, but really really hard to master. Do you have what it takes to guide your chopper on this mission? Download to find out!
